current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the United States Capitol in commemoration of the Shimon
			 Peres Congressional Gold Medal ceremony.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following concurrent resolution; which was considered and agreed to

header.#text:
Use of the rotunda of the United States Capitol in commemoration of the Shimon Peres Congressional
			 Gold Medal ceremony

text.#text:
The rotunda of the United States Capitol is authorized to be used on June 26, 2014, for the
			 commemoration of the award of the Congressional Gold Medal to Shimon
			 Peres.

Physical preparations for the conduct of the ceremony described in subsection (a) shall be carried
			 out in accordance with such conditions as may be prescribed by the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SCON 37 ATS: Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the United States Capitol in commemoration of the Shimon Peres Congressional Gold Medal ceremony.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
